message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a deal now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I'm willing to split the money evenly, but I'll take $60 and leave you $40 to incentivize you to accept. It's in both our best interests to avoid more rounds and inflation eating away at our money.

Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but my previous offer was much fairer considering the inflation. Let's compromise - I'll take $55, you take $45.  This deal makes sense for both of us if we want to avoid further losses.
